reviews.review_msg: Get ready to WRITE! Joan is awesome and thought-provoking. Course structure is AWESOME, students pretty much taught themselves with Joan facilitating (discussions + last 3 weeks were just presentations). Learned a LOT. DO NOT SKIP CLASS, participating is big! Do all your reading and assignment on time and you will get an easy A. Great class!

Very straightforward.  A 3 page paper, and a 16 page paper which you must present to the class along with participation made up the components of the class. Joan is very friendly and approachable.  The presentations are great. Do the readings and you will be fine. I look forward to taking another class with her.

amazing prof. i was expecting this to be my hardest class, but it was SO easy! she's very knowledgeable. although it may seem like there's a lot of assignments, they're so easy. she is such an EASY marker!
